0xF5A2C681787E579D.name: SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN_PARAMS
0xF5A2C681787E579D.comment: Sets the draw offset/calculated size for SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN. If using any alignment other than left/top, the game expects the width/height to be configured using this native in order to get a proper starting position for the draw command.
